text: Yury Sharov (; 22 April 1939 â€“ 12 December 2021) was a Soviet fencer. He won a gold medal in the team foil event at the 1964 Summer Olympics and a silver in the same event at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Sharov died on 12 December 2021, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet fencers
title: Yury Sharov
